content.question: Which of the following constructors, if added to the Bird class, will cause a compilation error?

choices.label: public Bird(String col, String str){species = str;color = col;canFly = false;}
public Bird(boolean cf, String str, String col){species = str;color = col;canFly = cf;}
public Bird(String col, String str, boolean cf){species = str;color = col;canFly = cf;}

content.answer: public Bird(String col, String str, boolean cf){species = str;color = col;canFly = cf;}

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
